CustomField.description: Sum of Amount on received Opportunities where Currency Type = EUR. Includes hard and soft credits, but is summing Opportunity Amount regardless of OCR (this means logic can't currently accommodate true partial credits). Excludes Planned Gifts. Calculated externally by the IT Data team and pushed into Salesforce nightly after qualifying changes
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Sums the ‘Amount’ on all received hard and soft credits where Currency Type = EUR for all contacts in this account (excludes Planned Gifts).
CustomField.label: Total Amount Committed Lifetime EUR
